name: Hungry Slime (andeux123)
description:
Hi Im Andeux123

Controls: W and A to move and Space to Jump and R to reset the Level.

This is a solo game made by, but the sprites the tile and background are from this guy: https://analogstudios.itch.io/four-seasons-platformer-tileset ,and nothing more the mutation theme by a hungry slime that like to eat color fruits Inspired by the slime Rancher, and the Pig in Natatzu No Tasai like that.

The bug Of the slime looking the other way fixes by looking at the right when you eat a fruit

Thank You For Playing.
